Josephine Lena Macy

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: W. W. Watkins
  3. Location of Family: Plattsmouth, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Women's and Children's Home
  5. Arrival Place: Greenwood, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 10
  7. Date of Birth: 1893-07-08, Jamaica, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1907-09-21
  9. Gender: female
  10. Notes: Death certificate attached showing self-administered poisoning as cause of death.
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Rootsweb, 9 July 2002.
